mapper.select: SELECT course.id `courseId`, course.`name` AS `courseName`,classes.id `classId`,classes.`name` `className`,teacher.`name` `teacherName` FROM teacher JOIN teach ON teacher.`no` = teach.tno left JOIN `open` ON teach.course_id = `open`.course_id left JOIN classes ON `open`.class_id = classes.id left JOIN course ON teach.course_id = course.id WHERE teacher.no=#{no}

SELECT course.id courseId, course.`name` courseName, teacher.`name` teacherName, classes.`name` className FROM course, teacher, classes, student, `open`,teach WHERE student.class_id = classes.id AND classes.id=`open`.class_id AND course.id=`open`.course_id AND teacher.`no`=teach.tno AND teach.course_id=course.id AND student.`no`=#{username}
